com.tyrlib2.graphics.animation

Class Bone

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneNode
      • com.tyrlib2.graphics.animation.Bone

  • public class Bone
extends SceneNode
    Represents a single joint of a skeleton. Further bones, SceneNode or vertices may be bound to this bone.
    Author:
    Sascha

        public void updateAll(Vector3 parentPos,
             Quaternion parentRot,
             Vector3 parentScale,
             float[] parentTransform)
        Description copied from class: SceneNode
        Updates the model matrix. There was an update in a parent node, therefore all children need to be informed and update their matrices accordingly.

        updateAll in class SceneNode
